name: torridly
content:
torridly adverb
(EMOTIONAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves strong emotions, especially those of sexual love: The script required the two stars to kiss torridly on several occasions. The book details the torridly complex relationship between the band's leading members.
More examplesFewer examplesI feared that I was in for a torridly emotional half-hour.The film ends with the couple kissing torridly on a station platform.The show includes some torridly sexy dance routines.
